alert.note: Alert for Adams (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:47PM CDT until May 07 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CASS...NORTHWESTERN UNION...NORTHEASTERN ADAMS AND ADAIR COUNTIES... At 747 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Orient, or 10 miles southwest of Greenfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Green Valley Lake, Green Valley Lake State Park, Orient, Nodaway Park, Greenfield and Greenfield Municipal Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
